name: Welcome to The Brotherhood
description:
Welcome to The Brotherhood is a small Bitsy game, inspired by the Assassin's Creed franchise. It is my very first Bitsy game (and first game that I ever published!) and I made it in nearly 1 hour. Thank you all for playing this, I hope that I will be developing more projects in future :D
You can also join my Discord to leave some feedback, it means a lot to me! link: https://discord.gg/aw6JnDj6c4

NOTE: This game is inspired by Ubisoft's Assassin's Creed franchise, and I do not make any profits from it.
